## Implementation Details

### TruncateTooltip Component API

```tsx
interface TruncateTooltipProps {
  text: string;           // Text to display
  maxLength?: number;     // Threshold for showing tooltip (default: 30)
  maxWidth?: string;      // CSS class for max width (default: "max-w-[200px]")
  className?: string;     // Additional CSS classes
  side?: "top" | "right" | "bottom" | "left"; // Tooltip position (default: "right")
}
```

### Key Features

- **Smart truncation**: Only shows tooltip when text.length > maxLength
- **Customizable**: Supports custom maxWidth, className, and tooltip positioning
- **Accessible**: Uses existing Radix UI Tooltip with proper ARIA attributes
- **Consistent UX**: Follows reference pattern with right-side tooltips and 380px max content width
